## PlaceholderExtension.attributes() method

When the view becomes available set the aria placeholder property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
attributes(): {
        'aria-placeholder': string;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{
        'aria-placeholder': string;
    }`
